title: Bloomberg Markets: Paul Reed Smith Goes From Guitars to Tech
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Paul Reed Smith Goes From Guitars to Tech
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Paul Reed Smith Master Luthier and Founder PRS Guitars and Digital Harmonic Discussing waveform and image processing technology with Scott Haiges, CEO at Digital Harmonic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
